source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_00<tab>Once again, Jullus has been entrusted with an unenviable task.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_00<tab>テルティウム駅のユルスは、思いつめたような面持ちだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_01<tab>Negotiations with the Ist Legion have failed, and Alphinaud and Alisaie have been taken as hostages. It has been decided that you will escort Jullus to Camp Broken Glass, where he will present the conditions for Alisaie and Alphinaud's release. Before that, however, he requests that you inform two of the soldiers charged with retrieving your contingent's supplies of your imminent departure. He also gives the rather cryptic instruction that his comrades “ask the iyl” for further details, although its meaning is entirely lost on you for the moment.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_01<tab>ユルスから伝言を頼まれた。テルティウム駅の「マルケリヌス」と「オクタウィア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_02<tab>The two soldiers give very different yet equally startling responses to the suggestion that they “ask the iyl,” and it is clear they know precisely what this entails. As neither appears willing to expound further on this riddle, your only choice is to glean the truth from Jullus himself.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_02<tab>ふたりに伝言を伝えた。テルティウム駅の出口にいる「ユルス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_03<tab>When pressed about his instructions to ask the iyl, Jullus remains tight-lipped. The only hint he gives is that, providing your allies agree to Quintus's demands, the true meaning will be of no relevance to you. While this is hardly reassuring, he reminds you that the two of you must cooperate to ensure the negotiations reach successful conclusion. He then asks that you wait for him at a location nearby that he wishes to visit on the way to Camp Broken Glass.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_03<tab>ユルスとともに出発することになった。ウルバニッシマ区にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB3CB01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_04<tab>After taking a brief detour past what remains of Jullus's home, you arrive at your camp. The negotiations have barely begun when you learn that Alphinaud and Alisaie have been freed by your comrades, depriving Quintus of his leverage. With the tables turned, Jullus and the other troops prepare to carry out their second set of orders by launching an attack on the Ilsabard contingent. Before any blood is spilled, however, you receive yet more surprising news. You learn that the Xth Legion─the reinforcements Quintus had been expecting─have instead agreed to a truce with the Grand Company of Eorzea. Quintus then commands his soldiers to comply with the Xth's wishes, thus ending the confrontation.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_04<tab>第I軍団とイルサバード派遣団の交渉が行われた。ガレマルドのキャンプ・ブロークングラスにいる「ルキア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_05<tab>Thanks to Lucia's calm handling of a perilous situation, as well as the political maneuvering of your allies at home, hostilities between the Ilsabard contingent and the Ist Legion have come to an end. However, the question of what lies ahead has yet to be answered.
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SEQ_05<tab>ルキアに無事だったことを安堵された。ユルスたちの未来は、どうなるのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_100_000<tab>Why are you here? To laugh at our misfortune!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_100_000どうした「英雄」、俺たちを無様だと思ってるのか？
ちくしょうめ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_000<tab>You will accompany me back to your camp, where I will meet with your leader and present Lord Quintus's demands.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_000お前には、俺と一緒に、派遣団のキャンプへ向かってもらう。
条件を伝えて、あちらと交渉する役目だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_001<tab>Before we depart, however, there is something I would ask of you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_001……俺が出発の準備をしてくる間、
ひとつ頼まれごとをしてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_002<tab>Assuming your contingent complies, the supplies they surrender will need to be transported here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_002派遣団との交渉が成立し、
物資を残して撤退させることができた場合、
その物資をここまで運んでくる必要がある。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_003<tab>That task falls to Legionaries Marcellinus and Octavia, who will pilot magitek armor to your headquarters. You are to inform them that we are leaving shortly.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_003そこで、第I軍団兵の「マルケリヌス」と「オクタウィア」に、
魔導アーマーに乗る準備をしておくよう伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_004<tab>Tell them to <var 1A 02 /var>ask the iyl<var 1A 01 /var> for further details. In those words.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_004『詳しいことはイルに聞け』と……
そう言ってくれれば、すべて伝わるはずだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_005<tab>Once you've seen to that, meet me by the exit.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_005それが済んだら駅の入口で合流しよう。
……頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_011<tab>"Ask the iyl,“ he said? Heh...heh heh... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_011『詳しいことはイルに聞け』と……
本当にそう伝えるよう、命じられたのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_012<tab>So. That's to be the way of it. After all this...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_012ああ……そうか……。
ついに、それを聞く日がきちまったのか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_013<tab>How ironic that you should be the one to deliver the news.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_013お前からの伝言だったのは、あまりに皮肉ってもんだ。
だが、命令は了解した……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_014<tab>If those are my orders, then so be it. For the glory...of Garlemald...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_MARCELLINUS_000_014諸々、準備をしておくさ。
魔導アーマーのことも……もしものときのこともな……。

TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_020近寄るな……！
私には、お前と話すようなことなんてない！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_021<tab>"Ask the iyl“... So Lord Quintus has reached a decision.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_021『詳しいことはイルに聞け』だと！？
では、クイントゥス様のご意向は……！

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_022<tab>I knew he would understand. That he would recognize the savage is a ruthless, merciless creature, and to defeat him, we too must be...uncompromising...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_022ああ……賛成だ……賛成だとも……！
これ以上、お前や蛮族どもに無様な姿をさらすなど、
到底あってはならないことだからね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_023<tab>I...am ready. In the name of Emperor Varis, for the glory of Garlemald, I will fulfill...my duty!
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_OCTAVIA_000_023やってやるさ……。
ヴァリス様に、戦友たちに懸けて……！
ガレマール帝国のために……！

TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_030……ああ、来たか。
ふたりには、ちゃんと伝えてもらえたか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_A1_000_032<tab>Their duties involve more than the transportation of supplies, don't they?
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_A1_000_032<tab>本当に、物資運搬の命令だったのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_A1_000_033<tab>What do you mean by “ask the iyl”?
target: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_A1_000_033<tab>『詳しいことはイルに聞け』の意味は？

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_034<tab>Duty is rarely a simple thing. We <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> been given additional orders, though whether we will be required to follow them depends entirely on your contingent.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_034…………そうだ。
ただ、派遣団との交渉がうまくいかなければ、
必然的に任務の内容は変わることになる。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_035<tab>I am not at liberty to divulge that. What I <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> say is this: you have no cause for concern if our demands are met.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_035…………お前に話す理由はない。
派遣団との交渉がうまくいかなかった場合も含め、
俺たちは、いろいろと想定をしてるんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_036<tab>You and I are in this together now. Like it or not, we <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> to cooperate.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_036何にせよ、交渉が成立するに越したことはない。
お前も、うまく運ぶように協力してくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_037<tab>There is one other matter... A place I'd like to visit on the way to your camp.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_037では、派遣団のキャンプに向けて出発する……が、
途中、どうしても寄っておきたい場所があるんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_038<tab>It's a short walk from here. Follow me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_038ウルバニッシマ区の外れで、一度止まってくれ。
……どうか頼む。

TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_040……ここで間違いない。
少しだけ、俺に時間をくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Jullus lingers by the ruins, reluctant to leave and reluctant to stay. Unable to move on...
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_SYSTEM_000_050ここでユルスの用事が済めば、
彼とともにキャンプ・ブロークングラスに向かい、
派遣団との交渉を見届けることになるだろう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_060<tab>We will make no attempt to resist.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_JULLUS_000_060……キャンプを襲った者は、これで全員だ。
抵抗はしない。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_LUCIA_000_070<tab>Much and more has occurred since last we met.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_LUCIA_000_070)) (( )) 02 /var>殿……
貴公も無事に戻ってくれて、本当によかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_LUCIA_000_071<tab>As for determining what comes next, we must speak with Lord Quintus.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMB113_04392_LUCIA_000_071ひとまず、ユルス殿が襲撃に加わっていた者を集めてくれた。
彼らの今後については、誠意をもって検討したいと思う。
クイントゥス殿とも、相談をしながらな……。
